naslov: Prečko, Prostrana kuća na odličnoj lokaciji, 600 m2 (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Kuća veličine 600m2 s okućnicom veličine 408m2, smještena na odličnoj lokaciji u tramvajskoj zoni. Sastoji se od podruma s garažom, prizemlja s novom kupaonicom s tuš kadom, kuhinjom, blagavaonom i spavaćom sobom. 1. kat se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, kupaone s kadom, kuhinje s blagavaonom i dnevnim boravkom, te dvije prostrane sobe i izlazima na prostrane i dugačke balkone. 2. kat se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, nove kupaone s kadom, tuš kadom i wc školjkom, čajne kuhinje i dvije prostrane sobe, wc-a s dvije wc školjke, te isto kao i na 1. katu izlazima na prostrane balkone. 3. kat je neuređeni tavan, koji može poslužiti kao ostava. Parking za 2-3 auta u dvorištu kuće. Kompletno renovirano; obojani zidovi, nove kupaonice i toaleti, nove ograde na balkonima kuće itd. Namještaj u kući će se prema potrebi ukloniti. Kuća se nalazi na odličnoj lokaciji: blizina tržnice, tramvajske stanice, autobusne stanice, trgovina, Doma zdravlja, parkova itd. Pogodno za smještaj stranih radnika ili poslovni prostor. Agencija In-between d.o.o za uslugu posredovanja naplaćuje od kupca, po potpisu Ugovora o kupoprodaji nekretnine, posredničku naknadu u iznosu 2% od ugovorene kupoprodajne cijene. House of 600m2 with a garden of 408m2, located in a prime location in the tram zone. It consists of a basement with a garage, ground floor with a new bathroom with a shower, kitchen, dining room and bedroom. The 1st floor consists of an entrance hall, bathroom with a bathtub, kitchen with a dining room and living room, and two spacious rooms and exits to spacious and long balconies. The 2nd floor consists of an entrance hall, new bathroom with a bathtub, shower and toilet, kitchenette and two spacious rooms, a toilet with two toilets, and the same as on the 1st floor, exits to spacious balconies. The 3rd floor is an unfurnished attic, which can be used as a storage room. Parking for 2-3 cars in the yard of the house. Completely renovated; painted walls, new bathrooms and toilets, new railings on the balconies of the house, etc. The furniture in the house will be removed if necessary. The house is in a great location: close to the market, tram station, bus station, shops, health center, parks, etc. Suitable for accommodation of foreign workers or business premises. Agency In-between Ltd. for mediation services charges from the tenant, upon the signing of the Lease Agreement, agency fee in the amount of 1 MONTHLY RENT .
Troškovi: Iznos agencijske provizije koju plaća najmoprimac: 5000 EUR
adresa_agencije: Adresa:Iblerov trg 9, 10000 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
